name: UpdateEnvironmentSymbolSet
description:
Update error tracking symbol sets in environments.

Use this tool to update the symbol sets for error tracking within a specified environment by providing the project and symbol set IDs.

parameters.name: error_tracking_symbol_set_id
parameters.description: A UUID identifying the error tracking symbol set to update.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this error tracking symbol set.

parameters.name: project_id_for_symbol_set_update
parameters.description: The ID of the project for updating the symbol set. Obtainable via /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying this error tracking symbol set.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this error tracking symbol set.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
